name: Itero
description:
All playtesters welcome!

A 2D side-scrolling survival game, based around regeneration.

Every day, the world is regenerated. You have a minuscule area of items and blocks that you can keep. At night, while the regeneration is occurring, the whole world is filling with evil forces, forcing you to sleep.

Your aim? Slowly expand your area until the entire world is colonized.

Credits:
